data.message:
Time is slipping from me
I struggle with laziness, fuck that shit.
Something is not allowing me to evolve.
As soon as you start to get distracted.
It is necessary to take itself in hands and to make of ourselves to others. 

The mind says, "Come on bro go for it"!
Ego interrupts and says: "come, do not interact with the world. 

Looks like I'm going crazy
The voices in my head, doctor, is this normal?
Wait, You don't! You does not exist?!
That kind of nonsense? 
What happened to me?
Maybe I was too anxious.
Maybe you need to calm down, I tell myself.  😎✍️
